div.p: A required attribute of physdescstructured that specifies the nature of the statement being provided. "Carrier" refers to the number of containers; "materialtype" indicates the type and/or number of the material types; "spaceoccupied" denotes the two- or three-dimensional volume of the materials. If none of these values are appropriate, the value "otherphysdescstructuredtype" may be chosen and some other value specified in otherphysdescstructuredtype.
